In Waldheimia <S>[text?]<\s> flavescens there are 
two ‘hearts’ - situated as Prof. Owen describes 
them, but <s>[text?]<\s>
so far 
as I have been able to observe, <s>[text?]<\s> the 
ventricle cannot be described as an ‘oval’ cavity,
inasmuch as it is an elongated cavity 
bent sharply upon itself. <s>[text?]<\s>
<s>observed <\s> Hastily examined of course this appears oval.
<s>[text?]<\s> I have been <s>equally <\s> similarly unable to 
discover ‘the delicate membrane of 
the venous sinuses’ which is said by 
Prof Owen to “communicate with &
close the basal apertures of the auricle”
Still less can I comprehend how the
